en.title: Dr Emoto's Seminar In Jakarta 09th April 2010 A Great Success!
en.content:
REPORT BY INDONESIA COUNTRY LICENSEE PARTNER J M ANOWAR.

 

World Renowned Scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's Seminar in Jakarta, Indonesia "The Power Of Scalar Energized Water" on 09th April 2010 was a GREAT SUCCESS! FE is proud and honored to be able to bring Dr Emoto to share his knowledge and research with our Leaders and Members in Indonesia.

Highlights Of The Seminar Include:

 

- Welcome Speech by Indonesia Country License Partner, J M Anowar.
   
- Keynote address by Founder Director K S Lee.
   
- Sharing by Dr Amir Farid on “Scalar Energy” was well received and the audience understood more about the “power” of scalar energy!
   
- Keynote Speech by Dr Emoto. Dr Emoto who mesmerized the crowd with his profound knowledge of water. Dr Emoto delivered his research and findings on “Living Water” and what water means to us, with candor and simplicity. His visuals on water crystals charged with FusionExcel products and water crystals from various parts of Indonesia stunned the crowd especially when water was exposed to the Indonesia National anthem!
   
- Testimonial by Master Ho Hua Sien who shared his personal experience using FE products.
   
- Product demonstration by Executive Director Tjanoko Heru.

 

We like to thank  Patrick Widjaja, Irene F. Mongkar and SR Prabah for making the event happen, Presidential Directors Sam Ho and Susanto as well as Director Djohn Sutantoso for a great job as MC. Lastly we recognized the presence of Pak Gede Agung, a renowned spiritual leader from Bali.

See You At The Top! AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!

meta.description:
FE is proud to sponsor RM 62,000 (comprising of Quantum Science Scalar Energy Products) towards the 7 Summits Expedition which was officially launched by Duli Yang Teramat Mulia Tuanku Syed Faizuddin Putra Ibni Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin Putra Jamalullail (Tuanku Raja Muda Perlis) at the Kuala Lumpur International Airport on 24th March 2010.
Mr Patrick Chan, FE's Event Manager, presented a mock cheque of RM62,000 on behalf of FE to DYTM Tuanku Syed Faizuddin Putra Ibni Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin Putra Jamalullail at the event.
The earth is known to have 7 continents; namely, North America, South America, Antarctic, Asia, Europe, Africa, and the Australian Continent.
On each of these continent stands a highest mountain which has become a dream of professional climbers from all over the world to conquer it. Thus the name “7 Summits” which includes Mt Everest in Nepal, Mt Kilimanjaro in Tanzania, Mt Mc Kindley in USA, Mt Aconcagua in Argentina, Mt Vinson Massif in Antartica, Mt Kosciousko in Australia, Mt Elbrus in Russia or Mt Cartzen Pyramid in Indonesia.
meta.keyword: Dinner, Malaysia, Laos, Miss Malaysia, Natasha, FE, Directors, Mock Cheque
meta.author: KLHunter
